subject: Fish and Other Marine Life
Oil (Petroleum) and Gasoline
Offshore Drilling and Exploration
Accidents and Safety
Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: The BP oil spill has caused cancellations of offshore sports fishing tournaments along the Gulf Coast, which could harm the entire region’s economy.
